subject: Rajasthan History
question_en: Which famous fort in Rajasthan was built by Raja Raghoji I?
question_hi: राजस्थान में राजा राजेगोजी I ने किस मंगल को बनाया है?
explanation_en: Kumbhalgarh Fort was built by Rana Kumbha.
